overview: Old Fangs is a story about a young man in the shape of a small wolf (referred to as  Wolf), being confused and frustrated about his childhood. He has very fond  memories of his father and his very early life living isolated in the forest, with his  whole family.  His father, as the young Wolf remembers it, was a very strong person, a loner, but  responsible, skilled and brave. The classical father figure.
tagline: A young wolf decides to confront his father. He had not seen him since he was a child.
title: Old Fangs
